title: Introducing: Manou
body:
Sixteen year old Londoner **Manou** is destined for the big time; I’d be prepared to put money on it.

Currently working with PNUT (Amy Winehouse, Foxes, Dido), her sonic influences appear far more diverse than you’d imagine at first listen, with her debut track _Sadie_ proving a real early-mid 90’s R&B throwback, pirouetting into a more modern, radio-savvy direction. With a flurry of early, very positive press, it’ll be mightily interesting to watch where this hugely exciting young star goes next. Check out _Sadie_ below.
